alert.note: Alert for Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 8:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN FLAGLER...SOUTH CENTRAL ST. JOHNS AND SOUTHEASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 930 PM EDT... At 852 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crescent City, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, Fruitland, Orange Mills, San Mateo, and Satsuma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
